brute_force.description: Detects repeated failed login attempts from the same IP within a short time window.

port_scan.description: Detects port scanning activity by tracking unique destination ports from the same IP.

sql_injection.description: Detects SQL injection attempts based on suspicious payload patterns in requests.

xss.description: Detects reflected/stored XSS payload patterns in user input.

data_exfiltration.description: Detects unusually large outbound data transfers suggesting exfiltration.

anomaly_spike.description: Simple volume-based anomaly detection for per-IP or global traffic spikes.

multistage_intrusion.description: Correlates port scan → brute force → SQLi → data exfiltration in one chained intrusion.
